means: （计算机的）固件（指存储在存储器而非软件中的指令）

sentence.Network_cn: 看到下图所示屏幕的出现, 证明您已是在2.0固件上了.

entry.tran: 固件(由于经常使用而储存在芯片上的一组指令)
entry.def: In computer systems, firmware is a set of commands which are stored on a chip rather than as part of a program, because the computer uses them very often.

means.word_mean: 1. (computer science) coded instructions that are stored permanently in read-only memory

auth_sentence.content: How is that firmware going to be updated?

auth_sentence.content: The firmware that allows the software to develop after birth.

auth_sentence.content: Firmware is typically stored in the flash ROM of a hardware device.

means.word_mean: 韧体。（泛指直接控制硬件的软件，也指固化在硬件中用来控制硬件的软件，比如BIOS。）
